author: Luc Olinga
title: A Viral Question Is Puzzling Bitcoin Fans: Why Isn’t the Price Rising?
description: Corporations are buying billions, but the price is stuck. The answer reveals what Bitcoin has actually become.
content:
A question is going viral on social media, reflecting the confusion shared by Bitcoin skeptics and believers alike.
“Can anyone explain to me why companies are buying billions of dollars of Bitcoin … [+5141 chars]
